content: blo in the nxt 2 sts make 1 fpdc in the next 2 fpdc from previous row make 1 half_double_crochet blo in the next 6 sts** repeat ** to ** to the end & sls to the top of the 1st fpdc = 20 fpdc + 55 half_double_crochet = 75 sts turn showing decrease having 4 loops on hook and pull through all 4 which will decrease 1 st the brim is done from the wrong side as it will be folded now you will make the ribbing on the bottom of the hat i will try to explain how this is done but it might help if you look at the video below to see how it s done just highlight the link and copy then paste it in your browser it s called crochet ribbing tutorial by tl yarn crafts and it s how to add a brim to a hat https //www youtube com/watch v=xsepleuswmg you are now on the ws and you will chain 13 make a single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook and make a total of 12 single crochets going down that chain then you will sls in the next 2 available sts and then rotate your work so that you will skip these last 2 slip stitches you just made and go up that little ribbing and make 1 single_crochet in the blo of the next 12 sts now at the top you will chain 1 does not count as a st and go back down in the blo and make 1 single_crochet in the next 12 sts then you will sls in the next 2 available sts repeat this all the way to the end where you should have 1 or 2 sts left which you will sls and turn your hat inside out and sls those 12 sts of the brim* together showing where your did the first 12 single_crochet down the chain and going for the 2 sls in the next available 2 sts shown with 2 yellow stitch markers *ps when you sls the brim together insert your hook in the 2 loops on the brim closest to you and take only the blo on the brim part away from you see picture below attach a faux fur pompom or make a yarn one or leave hat as is cut yarn and weave in ends you are all done brim all slip stitched together adult/teen female hat should measure approx 9 5 to 9 75 inches wide and 8 5
